metadata.title: Bondi Band 2" Unisex Headband Non-Slip Head Band For Workout, Yoga, Running & Fitness One Size For All, Stretchy, Lightweight & Breathable Isabella Moisture Wicking Headband, multicolor (HB-6269)
features: MOISTURE WICKING: Moisture-wicking properties help draw sweat away so the headband stays light and your forehead stays dry. Perfect in everyday wearing and all kinds of sports activities like Yoga, Soccer, Running, Exercise, Travel, Working, Fitness, Basketball, Baseball, Football, Tennis and so on! Super soft perfectly absorbs all sweat during sports activities like yoga, running, and fitness.

UNISEX HEADBAND: The headbands are suitable for men and women, suitable for all kinds of outdoor sports and work, such as running, football, fitness, cycling, but also suitable for workers working outdoors. The headbands are very absorbent, the material is soft, durable, and comfortable.

ONE SIZE FITS ALL: Our workout headband was designed to fit different head sizes. Fashionable sports headband to keep hair out of your face while exercising, keeping you focused and comfortable. No marks on your forehead and no-slip. Forget about your old, tight, and boring headband that only caused you discomfort in the past. When you're running with it, it doesn't feel heavy.

VERSATILE & STYLISH: Trendy design with medium-thick contributes to an elegant workout for modern people. There are times when you are too busy to smarten up, Thatâ€™s why our headband is the accessory for your beautiful up-do, cute ponytail, or loose hair. It also has the innovative technique to wick away moisture while exercising making it even more comfortable without the worry of chafing or itching your forehead.
description: Bondi Band headbands are soft, breathable, and stretchy. Fabric is more durable and reliable. Seamless design makes you more comfortable. Choose our headband. Is your best choice. Our headband absorbs sweat more quickly than a normal cotton headband. Can be better solve the problem of sweat and breathability. Allowing you to various kinds of sports can keep cool and comfortable. Once you bring your headband, You will fall in love with it. Elastic fabric, which can be stretched at will, suitable for a variety of head circumferences. EASY TO USE: Unisex headbands are easy to wear, stretch directly on the head, no knot. They do not slide off your hair. They are easy to clean and dry quickly. Fit virtually every head size and shape, absorbs sweats and moistures easily, and evaporates sweats faster than an average cotton sweatband. These headbands will give a great fit without causing pressure or discomfort while keeping your hair in place. Let you feel warm in winter and cool in summer! FEATURES: Lightweight, Stretchy & Breathable. Moisture Wicking & No slipping. Unisex & One Size Fits Most. Machine Washable. 100% Made In The USA. Versatile, sporty headband for use as headwear in everyday life. It stays in place even when you are doing strenuous exercise. Let you do more sports with more focus. You do not have to worry headband will slide down. Forget about your old, tight, and boring headband that only caused you discomfort in the past. One size fits all, the elastic band closure of your headband gently hugs your head. So, Click on "ADD TO CART" Now & Bring home your workout partner.
